titleStmt.title: The Bern Physiologus
titleStmt.editor: INCLUDE A LINE FOR EVERY MEMBER OF YOUR TEAM

publicationStmt.p: Original digital edition created at Holy Cross Manuscripts Hackathon

sourceDesc.p: Edited directly from digital images from the e-codices project.

div.p: Caballus ante cabo dictus propter quod gradiens ungula in praessa terra concavet quod reliqua animalia non habent.
